portal.user.list.accountNotSelected.text: Please select an account{br}from top left to see users
portal.user.list.noUsersFoundWithTerm.te: No users found with the search term "{term}"
portal.user.edit.2FA.method.sms.title: When logging in, SMS with Verification Code will be sent to your phone number.
portal.user.edit.2FA.method.call.title: When logging in, you receive a voice call from the service with Verification Code.
portal.user.edit.2FA.method.app.title: Use an app to generate Verification Code. {link}
portal.user.edit.2FA.method.one_touch.ti: Use an app to verify login. {link}
portal.user.edit.resetPassword.instructi: Sends the user a link with instructions{br}on how to reset their password
portal.user.delete.disclaimer.text: Will lose access to UDN immediately and will not be able to log in anymore.
portal.user.edit.recoveryKey.helpText: You can use one-time recovery key to access your account if you lose your phone or otherwise have problems with accessing your account.
portal.user.edit.recoveryKey.modal.title: Recovery Key
portal.user.edit.recoveryKey.modal.helpT: This is one-time recovery key. Store it somewhere safe.
